title: Emauni
description: Through her poetry, Emauni shows the people around her that the best way to navigate obstacles in the world outside is to never give up on what's within.

title: The Art & Science of Dream Directing
description: Dream Directors describe the different techniques they use when challenging young people to turn their ideas into action.

title: Bryce
description: Meet Bryce. He is a 15-year-old sophomore at New Haven Academy who is launching a project to inspire his community through dance.

title: Vision 2020 Detroit
description: Students in Detroit reflect on their first year with The Future Project and their power to change their city.

title: Aha Moments
description: Young people recall their aha momentsâ€”the moments when they discovered just how to turn their dreams into reality.

title: EMPIRE
description: As San Francisco changes rapidly, its young people tell us why they feel the city will always belong to them.

title: Joyce's First Day
description: Dream Director Joyce Gendler takes us through her Dream Team's takeover of the first day of school at Richard R. Green High School in New York City.

title: It Begins
description: The first day of school should be full of inspiration and possibility. Dream Directors across the country show us what it's like to start the school year off with The Future Project.

title: Lab School: Setting a New Standard
description: A Dream Team in New York City redefines their school's culture and purpose.

title: A School Rediscovered
description: Students lead their school in DC as it rediscovers its identity and sense of possibility.

title: Brick City to Dream City
description: Watch as a school begins to turn one tough city into a city of dreams.
